summary: Page 81 (right side), chapter 5. Covers continuation fragment, sections 98-105, with grouping header 'shalom'. OCR captures all sections and structure well. A few minor text issues.

issues.description: OCR has 'ושבר מריב' but image shows 'ושכך מריב' - the word should be 'ושכך' (and calmed) not 'ושבר' (and broke).
OCR has 'באחדות בלב אחד כאיש אחד' but image shows 'באחדות כלב אחד כאיש אחד' - 'בלב' should be 'כלב' (one word, meaning 'as one heart').
